###############################################################
##
##  AUTO GENERATED - DO NOT EDIT
##
###############################################################
###############################################################


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS account;
CREATE TABLE account
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(30),
    typeCode char(1),
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index accountName on account (name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS accountUser;
CREATE TABLE accountUser
(
    uid varchar(30),
    roleCode char(1),
    lockVersion int,
    accountUid varchar(30),
    userUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create unique index uid on accountUser (uid);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS autoSignIn;
CREATE TABLE autoSignIn
(
    uid varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    lastUtcTs datetime,
    lockVersion int,
    userUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS download;
CREATE TABLE download
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    lockVersion int,
    userUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index created on download (createdUtcTs);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS email;
CREATE TABLE email
(
    uid varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    sentUtcTs datetime,
    subject varchar(100),
    fromAddress varchar(50),
    statusCode char(1),
    errorNotes varchar(100),
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index status on email (statusCode, createdUtcTs);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS emailPart;
CREATE TABLE emailPart
(
    uid varchar(30),
    sequence int,
    typeCode char(1),
    attachmentName varchar(30),
    data mediumblob,
    lockVersion int,
    emailUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index email on emailPart (emailUid);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS emailRecipient;
CREATE TABLE emailRecipient
(
    uid varchar(30),
    address varchar(50),
    typeCode char(1),
    lockVersion int,
    emailUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index email on emailRecipient (emailUid);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS file;
CREATE TABLE file
(
    id int AUTO_INCREMENT,
    name varchar(100),
    path varchar(100),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    statusCode char(1),
    size int,
    partialSize int,
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (id)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS invitation;
CREATE TABLE invitation
(
    uid varchar(30),
    statusCode char(1),
    accessKey varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    closedUtcTs datetime,
    lockVersion int,
    userUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index accessKey on invitation (accessKey);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS passwordReset;
CREATE TABLE passwordReset
(
    uid varchar(30),
    statusCode char(1),
    accessKey varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    closedUtcTs datetime,
    lockVersion int,
    userUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index accessKey on passwordReset (accessKey);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS patch;
CREATE TABLE patch
(
    name varchar(30),
    installedUtcTs datetime,
    source text,
    primary key (name)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS performanceLog;
CREATE TABLE performanceLog
(
    id int AUTO_INCREMENT,
    name varchar(100),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    durationMs int,
    primary key (id)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index name on performanceLog (name);
create index createdUtcTs on performanceLog (createdUtcTs, name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS serverSession;
CREATE TABLE serverSession
(
    uid varchar(30),
    active char(1),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    closedUtcTs datetime,
    lastTouchedUtcTs datetime,
    version varchar(30),
    lockVersion int,
    userUid varchar(30),
    autoSignInUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS settings;
CREATE TABLE settings
(
    code int,
    someMessage varchar(100),
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (code)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS systemLog;
CREATE TABLE systemLog
(
    id int AUTO_INCREMENT,
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    loggerName varchar(100),
    context varchar(100),
    message varchar(100),
    levelName char(5),
    levelCode int,
    threadName varchar(100),
    exceptionText varchar(100),
    primary key (id)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index levelCode on systemLog (levelCode, id);
create index createdUtcTs on systemLog (createdUtcTs, id);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS systemLogTrace;
CREATE TABLE systemLogTrace
(
    id int AUTO_INCREMENT,
    sequence int,
    value varchar(1000),
    logId int,
    primary key (id)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user;
CREATE TABLE user
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(30),
    email varchar(50),
    verified char(1),
    passwordSalt varchar(30),
    passwordHash varchar(40),
    timeZoneCode char(5),
    roleCode char(1),
    favoriteColor char(7),
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create unique index email on user (email);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user_pet;
CREATE TABLE user_pet
(
    uid varchar(30),
    pet varchar(30),
    primary key (uid,pet)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
